forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.
